casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin WILSON, Jr. No. 27P06-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of May 2007 by Defendant for "Amended Petition for Writ of Certiorari and/or Other Available Relief Pursuant to the All Writs Act":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
